profile: At Steam Dry Canada, our customers are our business. Our service technicians will provide these superior services with integrity and sincere customer service. We want to give our customers the most enjoyable in-home service that they have ever received and we are not satisfied until our customers are satisfied, guaranteed.

profile:
Pro Duct Cleaning Solutions is a locally owned business run by a dedicated team of professionals. We take great pride in our work; from the moment you contact us, to the moment we leave your home or business.
Our services are Duct cleaning, Furnace installation, AC installation, Radiant and Plenty more.

It might be time to have your air ducts and dryer vents cleaned. By removing dust, pet fur, mold, bacteria, and other contaminants from your ductwork and vents, you’ll improve the efficiency of your heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) system. You’ll also get a cleaner home with fewer allergens and pollutants circulating the air. In short, you’ll find yourself much more comfortable knowing that your air ducts and dryer vents are as clean as the rest of your home or commercial property.

profile:
Dr. Clean Air is an Ottawa-based, family-run company that serves Ottawa, Kanata, Orleans, and surrounding areas. We are an air duct cleaning company that professionally cleans heating, ventilating and air conditioning (HVAC) systems, including duct, furnace and dryer vents.

The secret to our thorough and successful duct cleaning services is our 6-step process that we use to ensure professional and satisfactory customer service. This process begins before our cleaning professionals enter your home, and ends only after all cleaning tasks are done and digital pictures taken to show the result of the cleaning.

We adhere to the highest standards of customer services and are not satisfied until you are. 


We promise you:

    Educated and trained staff
    Fully equipped trucks
    Higher standard equipment
    Higher standards of quality control

 

... and much more!
